data.eml:eml: Seven new species of the spider genus Ochyrocera from caves in Floresta Nacional de Carajas, PA, Brazil (Araneae, Ochyroceratidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brescovit, Antonio D., Cizauskas, Igor, Mota, Leandro P. (2018): Seven new species of the spider genus Ochyrocera from caves in Floresta Nacional de Carajas, PA, Brazil (Araneae, Ochyroceratidae). ZooKeys 726: 87-130, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.726.19778, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.726.19778
